post_loop_1.text: Oh, hey. Don’t mind me. I’m just taking a look at this table leg.
options: Good, you’re finally doing something useful with your life.
Lee, you’re at a party. Try to enjoy yourself.
Hey, Lee, I think I’m stuck in a time loop…

post_loop_2.content: It sounds like you’ve imagined up a problem even I can’t fix!

second.text: Oh, hey. Don’t mind me. I’m just taking a look at this table leg.
options: Good, you’re finally doing something useful with your life.
Lee, you’re at a party. Try to enjoy yourself.

branch_1.text: I’ll enjoy myself once I actually make myself useful.
options: You’re never going to be useful.
Well there’s nothing wrong with this table.

branch_2.text: Are you sure? I could just keep looking maybe…
options: Keep looking, maybe you’ll find something if you stare at it for an hour.
Yes, Lee, I’m sure. Please just try to enjoy yourself.

branch_3.content: Ok… ok… I’ll try to enjoy myself

branch_4.content: Actually, the washing machine upstairs is acting strangely. I think it might still work, but maybe you can give it a look?
